text:
The mercenaries have received a substantial update regarding face posing, which should be much more efficient. Update through the TF2-Trifecta if possible.
Updating will not break current projects, nor improve them. To update existing projects, get the "_fix_release.py" scripts in the link below. Scout's is generally used on all, except for Heavy, Engineer, and Spy. Paste, select a head, and run the script.
LINK:https://github.com/hisprofile/blenderstuff/tree/main/Tools/HWM%20Scripts|NAME:New HWM Scripts
